website_summaries.verdict: This average glass-door commercial fridge looks good on the outside, but may not get cool enough on the inside.
pros: Spacious and sturdy with multiple-option LED lighting and a stainless door handle
Holds products of all different sizes, but still manages to look and fit nicely in commercial spaces big and small
cons: Many users complain that the fridge doesn't keep it's contents cool enough

customer_reviews.title: Noises??
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cooler back in Jan.2018. It is nice, and has been pretty quiet, up until a couple of weeks ago (end of April 2018). The cooler now is making all of these noises, it sounds like a big bowl of rice crispies...snap, crackle and popping noises...all the time. I will be contacting the seller and will update this review with the response. But it works great otherwise, just need to know what all the noise is about.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sleek, beautiful, large fridge
customer_reviews.text: this fridge has a beautiful aesthetic. i was searching high and low for a controlled temp, cleardoor, *white* fridge and then found this one! there are so many on the market, this one was the winner! she’s so pretty, i use it as a flower cooler. she fits perfectly in my space! the only downside, is that it does get warm, behind and on the sides, and makes things around it warm, so don’t store things that melt near it. but other than that, the perfect clean beautiful fridge!
customer_reviews.author: Blaire K

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY FROM THIS EXPENSIVE PIECE OF CRAP!
customer_reviews.text: This unit lasted exactly 1 year and 3 weeks and now no longer cools our beverages under 50 degrees. It is out of warranty so that is $1,400 down the drain. STAY AWAY
customer_reviews.author: Kozyak Tropin

customer_reviews.title: my experience with this product is not good. if anyone reading it think twice before you ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this unit is POS and junk paid almost 14000$ didn't last long beverages getting warm temperature went on the 63 will not come down contact seller was told it only have a 30 days return policy ,this has disrupted our business Contact amazon had a conference. With manufacture but they cannot find any record of the said unit been purchase .so either this seller. Is selling something illegal ,my experience with this product is not good .if anyone reading it think twice before you buy it .and make sure u are protected.i don't trust this seller .this is junk
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for great service and product
customer_reviews.text: This fridge is so nice. The door seals nicely, the handles are thick enough and don’t feel cheap. The upper right corner was slightly damaged so I sent a picture to the seller and they have shipped me a new door due to arrive tomorrow. Hassle free, great product and great seller I dealt with.
customer_reviews.author: PolarBear224

customer_reviews.title: Absolute junk, quit working after 2 years...
customer_reviews.text: This pricey fridge worked great for 2 years, now it won't cool. Unbelievable given I paid $1400 for this fridge. Save your money and look for another model.
customer_reviews.author: Gueon

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking fridge.
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely built and has multiple options for the lighting. Most people will be fine with the default. The delivery guys called a few times ahead to make sure there is someone available before making the delivery.
customer_reviews.author: DWXC

customer_reviews.title: Stops working
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 2-3 months. It’s huge and now a huge inconvenience. Do not buy this garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Vik

customer_reviews.title: works and looks as advertised
customer_reviews.text: i have a small taproom / bottle shop and i use the merchandiser to display great beer!
customer_reviews.author: torr lewis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for our office break room nice lighting and keeps things very cold
customer_reviews.author: TRHenry

customer_reviews.title: Fridge
customer_reviews.text: I like it wish the LED lights went down the inside of the fridge door.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Cools quickly and looks great..we use it for our concession stand and store condiments, cheese and pizza sauce in it also.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Works great for what we needed
customer_reviews.text: We bought the edgestar as a salsa and dip refrigerator and it has worked perfectly fine, could use some side lighting but all and all it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra G. Estep

customer_reviews.title: Great looking.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking retail cooler. Quiet running.Drinks are selling well from them. Flexible shelf placement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and 36 degrees is cold enough for any beverage
customer_reviews.author: Eric LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: Breaks real quick and no repairmen will touch this brand.
customer_reviews.text: Started frosting over and therefore not cooling properly (requiring defrosting over weekends so that it'd work again, about every 2 weeks to a month) after 7 months of having the fridge. After 15 months, it's completely broken and NO APPLIANCE REPAIR SHOPS WORK ON THIS BRAND. NONE. NOT EVEN THE ONES LISTED ON THE EDGESTAR WEBSITE. Don't buy this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our needs - we are a golf shop/sports bar . . .
customer_reviews.author: Ruben F.

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for my office staff and they love it.
customer_reviews.text: Product lives up to its representation. Bought it for my office staff and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: CJP

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in July. About a month ago it started sounding rough. It has a constant noise that sounds like a bad fan bearing. It's loud enough to hear in other rooms. Also has random popping sounds. I have zero confidence that this unit will last beyond its warranty. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: L. Schacher

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for business and home use
customer_reviews.text: We initially purchased this product to replace a vending machine at our office that only offered 9 flavors of soda. We loved the first one so much that we purchased 2 more. One for our home garage to organize all our various beverages and another for our office. Love how easy it is to stock a variety of different sized drinks with the adjustable shelves. Also like how the shelves pull out for easy refilling. The cooler itself is compact and easy to fit into most spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Jannetta Litzman

customer_reviews.title: love this beverage fridge
customer_reviews.text: love the look and the space ,put it in our very large kitchen, don't know how we lived without it .every body that sees it in our home loves it. we put beer,wine,soda ,bottled water, pizza, lasagna, keeps your beverages nice and cold
customer_reviews.author: pb

customer_reviews.title: Good fridge so far
customer_reviews.text: Only had it in my office for some time but it is cooling the beverages fast and is keeping it cold. Its quiet, easy to set-up, so far it is a good or must buy for a solution to your beverage needs.
customer_reviews.author: Danayit Rufael

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived damaged and trying to get a new one in replacement was near impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Pearson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Will not cool below 67 degrees! I may change this rating after the replacement item works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: vvdubman

product_meta.title: EdgeStar Built-In Commercial Beverage Merchandiser with Temperature Alarm (12.38 Cubic Feet)
product_meta.description: Size:12.38 Cubic FeetDisplay your products and please your customers with perfectly chilled beverages using the EdgeStar 14 Cu. Ft. Built-In Commercial Beverage Merchandiser (VBR640). This merchandiser's thoughtful design, sleek appearance, and quality construction make it the perfect storage solution for your beverage selection. Commercial Refrigeration: Perfect for beverage storage in your place of business, this merchandiser is ETL-S approved to the NSF-7 standard meaning it is both developed and certified for commercial use in food and beverage applications Front Ventilation: Because this unit is built-in capable, you can place it in tight spaces, against walls, or flush with other units without worrying about ventilation Temperature Alarm: To better protect your food and beverages from spoiling, an intelligent temperature alarm will sound if either the door is left ajar or if there is an interruption to the unit's power supply Even Cooling: Hot spots and uneven cooling won't be an issue for this merchandiser due to its compressor-based forced air cooling, which evenly distributes cool air throughout the unit Intuitive Controls: Setting and monitoring this unit's temperature is quick and easy due to the easy-to-use control panel and LED digital temperature display Interior Lighting: Interior LED lighting illuminates your beverages, easing the selection process for your customers without giving off any harmful heat Dimensions: 69 5/8" H x 23 1/2" W x 24 1/4" D
feature_bullets: Built-in capable; 14 cu. ft. capacity; Commercial rated; Dual pane glass; Security lock; Temperature alarm; White cabinet, stainless steel trim
Intuitive control panel w/ digital display; Even forced air cooling; Interior LED lighting
Six (6) wire shelves; Four (4) leveling legs; Option to display in °F or °C; Temperature range: 36 - 43ºF
Display your products and please your customers with perfectly chilled beverages

PLEASE NOTE: Delivery will be curbside, inside delivery is not available. A valid phone number is required for delivery purposes, please ensure the correct phone number is provided in your shipping information when placing this order.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars70 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
